about_the_game:
Sanguine offers a classic survival horror experience set in a mysterious rural town in the 1990s. Something terrifying has been unleashed, and your mission is to survive long enough to unravel the mystery, recover your identity, and escape the nightmare.

Gameplay Overview:

Sanguine features intense survival horror gameplay with fixed camera angles that heighten the sense of fear and claustrophobia. Players will need to manage their resources carefully, scavenging for weapons, ammo, and health items while avoiding or confronting the terrifying Bloods. The game also includes intricate puzzles that will challenge your wits and unravel the deeper mysteries of the town.



  • Classic PSX Survival Horror: Featuring fixed camera angles, classic gameplay and tank controls.
  • Resource Management: Find unique weapons, equipment, ammo, and combine/craft items to help you survive & progress.
  • Weapon Variety: Utilize an array of weapons & upgrades to fight off your enemies.
  • Rich Story and Puzzles: Immerse yourself in a gripping narrative and challenging puzzles.
  • Intense Horror Atmosphere: Dynamic lighting, immersive sound design and environmental effects to heighten tension.
  • Original Music and Cutscenes: Enjoy a unique soundtrack and engaging cutscenes.
  • Original Found Footage: Acted in real life and spliced into the game, find an array of VHS tapes scattered around the town to help piece the story together.
  • Steam Achievements: Unlock various achievements as you progress.

Storyline and Characters:

You play as Kris, who finds herself on the verge of death after a car collision. Seeking help and answers at the local diner, Kris must navigate through the chaos and fear that has overtaken the town. As you uncover the truth, you'll fight through the abominations known as Bloods, determined to become one with you.

Kris is a character shrouded in mystery, suffering from amnesia caused by the car crash. Despite the disorientation and fear that come with memory loss, Kris is strong, smart, and determined to uncover her past. Her journey through the town of Craven Oaks is not just a fight for survival, but also a quest for self-discovery.

As players progress, they will uncover fragments of Kris's memory, gradually piecing together her mysterious past and the dark history of Craven Oaks. She will cross paths with other survivors, each with their own stories and motives. Some will offer help, becoming allies in her quest to survive and uncover the truth. Others may have their own agendas, potentially hindering her progress or putting her in greater danger. These interactions will test Kris's judgment and resilience, adding layers of complexity to her journey.

The town of Craven Oaks is a character in its own right, brimming with intriguing buildings, eerie landmarks, and hidden secrets. Once a peaceful and industrious community, it’s now shrouded in an unsettling atmosphere following the catastrophic events that have left it in turmoil.

In the heart of the town is the imposing AltRan Corporation building, a towering structure symbolizing both innovation and mystery. AltRan Corporation, known for pioneering new ways of travel, has funded nearly everything in Craven Oaks, weaving itself into the very fabric of the town. The company is run by the enigmatic Dr. Gabriel Altran, whose influence permeates every corner of the community.

Central to this terror are the Bloods, hive-minded parasites with a singular, terrifying goal: to find hosts to transform and take over. Once a Blood infects a host, the transformation is irreversible. The host becomes a part of the Blood hive, losing all sense of individuality and humanity. These transformed hosts are no longer capable of reason and become relentless, dangerous creatures driven by the hive's collective will.

Our game captures the nostalgic essence of classic PS1 graphics with meticulously crafted low-poly models and textures.
